[color=#2b9aeb]Introducing Attribute Cores[/color]\nRecycling Rare/Uncommon stickers will yield Attribute Core items representing the attributes found on the recycled sticker. Attribute Cores allow you to modify your stickers by adding/upgrading the attributes on them, provided you can pay the resource costs associated with the attribute.

[color=#2b9aeb]New Sticker Interactions[/color]
Interacting with stickers in your inventory or directly on your monster tape will display options to Apply, Upgrade, or Remove Attributes.
[ul][color=#2b9aeb]Apply Attributes[/color]
[i]Attempt to attach an applicable attribute to the sticker. Chance of success varies with each attribute. [/i][/ul]
[ul][color=#2b9aeb]Upgrade Attributes[/color]
[i]Re-roll an existing attribute's value, the upgrade is successful only if the new value is higher than the current value.[/i][/ul]
[ul][color=#2b9aeb]Remove Attributes[/color]
[i]Removes an existing attribute on your sticker. Success is guaranteed.[/i][/ul]
